text: Ne mulaame Nyasaye ne mulamusasiakhwo nende shiosi shiosi tawe. Ne mukholele abebusi benyu amalayi nende abekho nende abana abafwilwa nende abamanani nende omumenyanwa owahambi nende owahale, nende owomumbafu nende omuburi njila, nende abali mumikhono chienyu emisatsa. Toto Nyasaye shiyachama Abandu abafuru abokhwilola tawe
